_options.title: Site name (used in meta tags and templates)
_options.url: Full site URL including https:// (no trailing slash)
_options.author: Default author name (can be overridden per page)
_options.skipDirs: Additional directories to skip when detecting root content
_options.theme: Active theme name from templates/ folder
_options.strictThemeIsolation: Prevent fallback to embedded theme (default: false)
_options.readingSpeed: Words per minute for reading time calculation (default: 200)
_options.strictImages: Exit build on broken image references (default: false)
_options.discoverTemplates: Auto-detect template syntax in assets (default: false)
_options.fingerprintAssets: Add content hash to CSS/JS filenames (default: false)
